General_Description: '''Blades of Justice''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "A nuisance is coming to the [[Greece|Greek world]]. We don't want to create an open war with them, so kill them mostly silently."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and killed [[bandit]]s with [[sword]]s and [[spear]]s and by assassination, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
